item.description:
Salsa Meetup Practices are held every Sunday and are organized by Anara Frank, our assistant meetup organizer! The practices are held each Sunday from 4:30-6:00 pm at the Community Art Center in Cambridge. They cost $5, and are open to the public--for dancers of all levels!

We will provide music, mirrors, hard wood floors, and a few fun, welcoming people to get the dancing started! There will be no organized instruction, so all participants should come ready to learn from and to help each other.

Please continue to check the message board for updates, because we will post any changes or cancellations there.

Special Bonus!! Meet-up Member DJ Rob Suave has generously offered discounted admission to Salsa Sundays at Ryles for all practice participants. When you arrive at the practice, you will simply sign-up on the list and pay $7, and then you can stroll into Ryles that night at any time you'd like! (Please note: sign up will only take place from 4:30-5:30 pm at CAC. Regular Admission to Sundays at Ryles is $10).

For directions and parking information, please click here or paste this link into your browser: http://www.metamoveme...

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact Anara (http://salsa.meetup.c...)

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Weekly Salsa Meetup Practice
